The screenshot of the memorandum titled: World Vision Financial Transactions" from the US Senate's Committee on Finance dated December 22, 2020, was shared on Twitter on January 16, 2021.
The image of the memorandum was shared o: including Twitter and Facebook, alongside similar claims.
The expert: s analysis of the claim concluded that it is misleading and that the memorandum does not state that Obama has been declared a sponsor of Al-Qaeda. Instead, it highlights World Vision's mishandling of taxpayer money and their responsibility for partnering with and paying the Islamic Relief Agency, a group sanctioned by the US for funding extremist groups.
